name: All roads lead to rhum
description:
Description

All roads lead to rum is a 3D dynamic game where the player controls the greatest pirate on his favorite barrel. Inspired by games like Hamsterball et Marble Madness, the player must dodge different obstacles to obtain as much rum as possible.

Instructions

Find the 3 barrels of rum and come back to the flag without falling off the platform. The bottles of rum are bonus points. The left joystick controls the platform (moving the stick will tilt the platform in the corresponding direction), the right joystick controls the camera and, the B button opens the menu. 

Crédits

Graphics & animations : Guillaume Biquet
3D & physics : Alexandre Vanhove
UI : Maxime Lim
Level Design : Alexandre Vanhove, Guillaume Biquet
Music: Etienne Decarpentries
